First BCORMA Fun Ride of the season - 2012 Creaky Bones Fun Ride Sunday April/16th at OK Falls

Click on the poster to enlarge for more details & directions.

Included with your registration will be a 2012 SODBC membership and a 2012 BCORMA Bronze Trail Pass.  This entitles you to a $15.00 discount to the BCORMA Ride School on Saturday April 15th.  Pre-register for the school in the BCORMA Store.

Bring a copy of your paid pre-registration to the sign-up desk to receive your 2012 SODBC and BCORMA Trail Pass decals.
